---
title: "Get Involved"
---

We welcome anyone interested in advancing reproducible research in transportation!

## How to Get Involved

### Join Our Community

- Subscribe to our mailing list for updates on events and opportunities
- Follow our activities on social media
- Attend our workshops and tutorials at major conferences

### Contribute

- Share your reproducible research practices and experiences
- Help organize events and workshops
- Collaborate on developing best practices and guidelines

### Contact Us

For more information or to get involved, please reach out to the steering committee members listed on our [Team](team.qmd) page.
